author: karlgandhi360
title: Cardano Discord Integration
description: Many projects on Cardano have discord servers for their community however they are no discord bots to make interaction with Cardano easier.
solution: The proposed bot would have many different features which would include verification if a user has staked to a pool/ amount staked to a pool
experience:
Working in the Engineering team of a well known Cardano DEX.
Formal university education in mathematics and computing.
Web App experience.
